description: Royal Robbins took their classic outdoor sweater and packed it with performance features for added breathability and comfort. Open stitch areas are intentionally placed in key heat zones like the underarms for added ventilation. Combining the natural benefits of non-mulesed Merino wool, like odor resistance and thermoregulation, with quick-drying, durable nylon, this sweater is the perfect layer for adventuring during cool months.
name: Royal Robbins Ventour Sweater - Mens
